Daly_City.Church and 30th Street station:
The 30th Street station is the main railroad station in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, and one of the seven stations in Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority's (SEPTA) Center City fare zone. It is also a major stop on Amtrak's (National Railroad Passenger Corporation) Northeast and Keystone corridors.


== Description ==
The station's address is 2955 Market Street.
